mapper.select:
select e.id, e.equipment_id as equipmentId, e.equipment_name as equipmentType, m.name as mainStadium, s.name as subStadium, e.status from equipment e left join main_stadium m on e.parent_id = m.id left join sub_stadium s on e.stadium_id = s.id
e.equipment_id like CONCAT('%',#{equipmentId},'%')
and e.equipment_name = #{equipmentType}
and m.name like CONCAT('%',#{mainStadium},'%')
and s.name like CONCAT('%',#{subStadium},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO equipment ( id, equipment_id, equipment_name, stadium_id, parent_id, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{equipment_id}, #{equipment_name}, #{stadium_id}, #{parent_id}, #{status} )
